titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the St. Xavier College academic medals collection

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Tim McCabe using the OhioLINK EAD Application in 2014

did.head: Overview of the Collection

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Xavier University Archives and Special Collections

did.unittitle: St. Xavier College academic medals collection
did.abstract: This is a collection of academic medals awarded between the years 1887 and 1909 to St. Xavier College students Henry B. Poetker, Albert H. Poetker and Peter E. Dempsey. The collection includes some accompanying notes.

bioghist.head: Biography of Biography or History
bioghist.p: These medals were given to recognize student academic accomplishments at St. Xavier College, Cincinnati, Ohio.The presentation of the awards in this collection are documented in the St. Xavier course catalogs for the periods concerned. Most of the medals (6) were awarded to Albert H. Poetker who later became a Jesuit priest, taught at Xavier University, and later became president of the University of Detroit.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Eight academic medals awarded for various accomplishments. Included with the collection is one typeset "X" block letter.

arrangement.head: Statement of Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is mainly arranged into folders by the year of award presentation, beginning with 1887 and concluding with 1909.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Box Number, Folder Number, XUA-39, St. Xavier College academic medals collection, Special Collections and University Archives, Xavier University Library, Cincinnati, Ohio.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Poetker medals were given to Xavier University by Miss Rose M. Poetker in 1980, the Sesquitennial Year of Xavier University.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
